content_html: Kathmandu, Sept 21: President Ramchandra Paudel has authenticated the bill to amend Nepal Citizenship Act, 2063 today. President Paudel authenticated the bill passed by both houses of the Federal Parliament in accordance with the Constitution, reads a press release issued by Spokesperson of the Office of the Presiden

title: President Paudel authenticates bill related to Citizenship
